K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-1: a'arya sapta buddha kam n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-3: 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-7: bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-8: na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-10: dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-11: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-17: kun nas me tog dang; de dag la sogs pa
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:22b-18: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge @23a *//
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-1: slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-2: gos med la lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-3: pa gzigs so // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-4: sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-5: phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-6: lha nga sa la btsugs nas /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-8: mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-11: nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-12: dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-13: lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di yang su zhig lags /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-15: sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-18: 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-19: cig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-21: sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-22: ces gsol to // nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-23: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-0: de nas nam @23b mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub ba'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-4: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-5: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-6: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-13: na mo dza ga na mi tsa n'a ya /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-17: snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-19: gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-21: kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs chu dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-22: me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-23: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-24: de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-26: skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-27: pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:23b-28: nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-4: mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-6: skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-10: nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-11: las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-13: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-14: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-15: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-16: na mo buddha ya; na mo dharm'a ya /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-18: aom pa tsa pa tsa pa ts'a ya pa ts'a ya /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-24: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-25: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-27: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-28: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-29: rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24a-30: gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zungs shig /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-0: gang la la zhig nga'i @24b snying po 'di nyin
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-1: lan gsum yid la byed na de la pha rol
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-2: gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-3: gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-4: gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-5: 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-6: phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-7: // de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-8: nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-9: 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar las bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-12: byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-13: mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-14: gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-16: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-17: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-18: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-26: ku ru sarba gra h'a n'am sv'ah'a /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:24b-28: gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-2: ngas kyang da ltar bshad de /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-4: khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-8: de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-11: rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing chu dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-12: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-13: gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-14: sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtogs so //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-18: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-19: nas mgo bkrus te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-20: lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-21: de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-22: de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-23: sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-24: 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-28: 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-29: mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-30: dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25a-31: sbrang rtsi la sngags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-0: @25b r'a dz'a nam r'a dz'a ma tra ba sh'i ka ra tu ksha me na /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-1: 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-2: bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-4: sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-5: sdig pa sbyangs zhing dpal chen po dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-6: nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub par 'dod na /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-7: 'o ma can gyi shing sbar shing gis me bus
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-8: la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-9: // sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-10: rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'dod pa dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-11: bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-21: 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-22: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa gsar pa bzhag ste /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-23: zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-24: sngar snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags la khrus
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-25: bya'o // dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-26: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-27: ba'i lci bar smyugs la brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-28: smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-31: 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:25b-32: sbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-0: // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs @26a *//
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-1: pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-2: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-3: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-4: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-8: na ma:kra kutstsha na d'a ya /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-15: ki t'a pa ya na ma:sv'ah'a /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-18: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-19: ba gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-20: gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-22: blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-25: dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-26: bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-28: spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par 'gyur te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-29: tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-30: lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26a-31: yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-0: yang na cho @26b ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-1: 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-2: tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-5: skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun sngags te zos
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-6: 'thung na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-7: // ji ste skom zhi bar 'dod na /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-8: bza' ba thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-9: lhog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-12: bcings pa thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-15: log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-16: ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-17: des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-18: 'khor bskus la aa ga rus bdugs te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-19: lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-20: de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su stan te nyal na /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-22: yid la ci smos pa de thams cad ston to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-25: pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:26b-26: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-0: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i @27a *//
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-2: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-3: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-5: na mo dharm'a ya; na ma:sam gha ya /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-6: na ma:ka na ka mu na ye /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-21: ka na ka mu na ye /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-23: aarha te samyaksam buddh'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-24: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-25: chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-28: gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-29: tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-32: lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-33: dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-34: dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-38: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-39: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27a-40: dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-0: ci ste @27b pha rol nad las thar bar byed
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-1: par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-2: po ga gam / aa ga rus bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-5: mchin skran la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-7: rtsa brgyad sngags la bskus na mdze nad thams cad
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-9: zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-10: spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-11: lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags te mi'i mgo la bcings
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-12: na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-13: mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-14: lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-15: de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-16: las thams cad pa zhes bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-18: nam mkha' la bzhugs te sems can thams cad la
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-20: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-21: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-22: na mo bud dh'a ya; na mo dharm'a ya /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:27b-29: aarha te samyaksam bud dh'a ya /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub sems
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-5: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-6: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-7: gsungs pa ste / nam mkha'i snying po /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-8: khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zungs shig; kun chub par gyis shig /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-13: mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byed na /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-14: mdor na; rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-15: de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-16: sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-17: las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-19: sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-20: ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-21: stong rtsa brgyad sngags te bklags shing bkrus na sos
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-22: par 'gyur ro // klad pa na ba la sangs
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-23: rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-24: par 'gyur ro // sngar bzhag ste / sangs rgyas
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-25: kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-26: par 'gyur ro // sngar bzhag ste / // thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-0: sems can thams cad la phan @28b ba'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-10: ma h'a tsa le; dhu re dhu re /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-23: ma h'a dhu me; tsa le tsa le /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-29: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-30: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-31: klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-33: sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-36: khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-38: dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-40: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te /
K12D0512=D0270=D0852_H0490:28b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
